Bash(# Font Awesome 6の最新バージョンをcdnjsで確認
curl -s --max-time 15 "https://api.cdnjs.com/libraries/font-awesome?fields=version,versions" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c "
import sys, json
try:
    d = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
    print\('Font Awesome current version on cdnjs:', d.get\('version'\)\)
    versions = d.get\('versions', []\)
    print\('Recent versions \(last 10\):', versions[:10] if versions else 'N/A'\)
except Exception as e:
    print\('Error:', e\)
" 2>/dev/null)

Bash(# Check if Firebase v8 has any known security advisories - check npm audit
curl -s --max-time 15 "https://registry.npmjs.org/firebase/8.10.1" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c "
import sys, json
try:
    d = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
    print\('Firebase 8.10.1:'\)
    print\('  name:', d.get\('name'\)\)
    print\('  version:', d.get\('version'\)\)
    print\('  deprecated:', d.get\('deprecated', 'NOT deprecated'\)\)
    print\('  engines:', d.get\('engines', 'N/A'\)\)
except Exception as e:
    print\('Error:', e\)
" 2>/dev/null)
